attributes.action: Legal action be taken against G4S
attributes.additional_details:
Legal action to be taken against G4S for Breach of Contract and the reported £57 million management fee be refused.
At date of petition, reports state that over 6000 troops and several thousand police will be used to ensure thesecurity of London 2012. This will be borne by the taxpayer as history has shown that only a small proportion of the costs are ever sought.
